tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable due to insufficient entropy in the signature algorithm. The `nonce` (or `k`) used in transaction signatures must be unique for every message. Reusing the same nonce across different messages allows attackers to exploit the weakness and recover the private key, compromising the security of the system.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `viem` library to the patch version.
